verses.verse: I will <S%H7311>extol<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord; for you have lifted me <S%H1802>up<s%>, and have not made my <S%H341>foes<s%> to rejoice over <S%H8055>me<s%>.
O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, I <S%H7768>cried<s%> unto <S%H7495>you<s%>, and you have healed me.

O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, you have brought <S%H5927>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H7585>grave<s%>: you have kept me <S%H2421>alive<s%>, that I should not go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit<s%>.
<S%H2167>Sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, O you <S%H2623>saints<s%> of <S%H3034>his<s%>, and give thanks at the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of his <S%H6944>holiness<s%>.

For his <S%H639>anger<s%> endures but a <S%H7281>moment<s%>; in his <S%H7522>favor<s%> is <S%H2416>life<s%>: <S%H1065>weeping<s%> may <S%H3885>endure<s%> for a <S%H6153>night<s%>, but <S%H7440>joy<s%> comes in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.
And in my <S%H7959>prosperity<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%>, I shall <S%H5769>never<s%> be <S%H4131>moved<s%>.

<S%H3068>Lord<s%>, by your <S%H7522>favor<s%> you have made my <S%H2042>mountain<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5797>strong<s%>: you did <S%H5641>hide<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%>, and I was <S%H926>troubled<s%>.
I <S%H7121>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord; and unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> I made <S%H2603>supplication<s%>.

What <S%H1215>profit<s%> is there in my <S%H1818>blood<s%>, when I go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit<s%>? Shall the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H5046>you<s%>? shall it declare your <S%H571>truth<s%>?
<S%H8085>Hear<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H3068>me<s%>: Lord, be you my <S%H5826>helper<s%>.
You have <S%H2015>turned<s%> for me my <S%H4553>mourning<s%> into <S%H4234>dancing<s%>: you have put <S%H6605>off<s%> my <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>, and <S%H247>girded<s%> me with <S%H8057>gladness<s%>;

To the end that my <S%H3519>glory<s%> may <S%H2167>sing<s%> praise to <S%H1826>you<s%>, and not be silent. O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>, I will give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto you for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
